title: How to Make a No Carb Vinegar and Oil Salad Dressing

steps.headline: Add all ingredients to a salad cruet or small jar.
steps.description: Close jar with lid and shake well.

steps.headline: Serve over your favorite tossed salad.

text: Add all ingredients to a salad cruet or small jar. Close jar with lid and shake well. Serve over your favorite tossed salad.  Serves 2.
